column1: Casal di Principe (Campanian: Casale 'e Principe or simply Casale) is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Caserta in the Italian region of Campania
column2: located about 25 kilometres (16 mi) northwest of Naples and about 20 kilometres (12 mi) southwest of Caserta. It has a population of approximately 21
column3: 000 people. The town is located on the territory of Agro aversano - a rural area with 19 comunes spread on its land
column4: and is directly linked to the comune of San Cipriano d'Aversa.

column1: Casal di Principe is also known for the export of buffalo mozzarella and organised crime.
